title: Umami Salt and Pepper
ingredients: - ¾ cup homemade Mushroom Seasoning Powder or 1 cup (4 ounces) store-bought
directions: MIX the ingredients in a bowl, then blend in batches in a spice grinder to a fine powder. Stir once more.
IT keeps in an airtight container in the pantry for up to 4 months, but begins to lose vibrancy after 2 weeks.
